GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Sanity check block descriptor length in resp_mode_select()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.11 by commit dfc3fff63793c571147930b13c0f8c689c4281ac. For more details please see the references link.
